reviews.review: алах над нами, земля под нами, ножи в кармане, ВПЕРЕД МУСУЛЬМАНЕ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!11!!!!1!!11!!

Possibly the best competitive shooter of all time. If you are into playing competitive games then this really is a must have. It is well optimised, well balanced and has been fine tuned to have an extremely great competitive experience. The community can be a bit toxic at lower levels but if you get up to the higher levels then it is easy to find like-minded players to join you. If you put in the hours and become genuinely good at this game then it can be very rewarding and I would definitely recommend it.

We all know what csgo is.... a cancer and how do you kill cancer in this case? You'll uninstall and never ever play it again or your soul will be doomed forever. 
Csgo is a game made by devious developers that will feed on your failure, anger, sadness and when you are on your lowest they will force you to buy they're overpriced and useless skins that will somehow make you feel better from everything this game has done to you. Endless hours spent behind monitor training aim to be better. Endless hours of learning smokes, flashes and more. Just to play a game with full team of retarded non-thinking degenerate apes that have never seen light of the day light. Sitting home 24/7 without a girlfriend lacking at school and shit. Playing this cursed game causing others even themselves brain damage. Even tho there is always light in the darkness. But the price to pay is too high. You gotta shoot those motherfuckers in the head but, we live in a society in which we are all equal to each other and shooting others in the head is in most states unfortunately illegal. Last thing I would like to say it's that you'll regret those hours you put in this game believe me. If you're still reading you fat fuck i bet you're eating chip and you got 2litres of coke on your table. Go hit the gym, go talk to that girl you told yourself in your head yesterday 'damn she's pretty', go hit your shot. Start doing something worth it. Be better for yourself and click uninstall. Ty everyone who got there and fuckoff now i told you few sentences before. Peace✌.
